title: FYP #27 Choosing to Stay
description:
Living life committed to one another can be the hardest part of relationships, but it’s also the best part. Here are 3 questions to ask, 2 verses to dig deeper, and 1 challenge for the weekend.

Download the book club guide PDF here: jennieallen.com

Get your copy of Find Your People: findyourpeoplebook.com

Become one of our texties by texting the word PODCAST to 214-225-6267
